thread.title: FIS has ‘no doubt’ Olympic venue can host test event in 2016
thread.title_full: FIS has ‘no doubt’ Olympic venue can host test event in 2016

author: wtopstaff
title: FIS has ‘no doubt’ Olympic venue can host test event in 2016
text:
Home » News » Sports » FIS has 'no doubt'… FIS has ‘no doubt’ Olympic venue can host test event in 2016 By ERIC WILLEMSEN October 23, 2015 10:35 am 
SOELDEN, Austria (AP) — The international ski federation has “no doubt” that the downhill venue for the 2018 Pyeongchang Olympics will be ready in time to host a test event in February next year despite massive construction delays. 
FIS says the Austrian manufacturer who is building the gondola lift will meet a Jan. 10 deadline, four weeks before two men’s World Cup races are scheduled for the Jeongseon ski resort. A snow-making system also still needs to be completed. 
Men’s race director Markus Waldner says “the concrete is there, they are working 24 hours, seven days. The last update we got was that they meet the timeline.” 
Waldner adds “we have no doubt but we know there are delays. We push the organizers. On paper it works, in reality we’ll see.” Topics:
